analysis: The project currently has a basic structure for a website about black holes, but lacks the specific animated objects and slides as mentioned in the event. The theme needs to be enhanced to reflect a cosmic and black hole aesthetic, with animated elements and interactive features.

improvements.description: Enhance the CSS file to include a dark, cosmic theme with animations for black hole visuals, swirling effects, and glowing elements. Add CSS animations for interactive planets and animated slides related to black holes.

Complete the HTML content to ensure all sections are properly included, such as the main content area with interactive planets, animated slides, and other sections related to black holes. Add a mobile-friendly navigation menu with a hamburger icon for better usability on mobile devices.

Update the JavaScript file to add event listeners and functionality for the new buttons added in the HTML. Implement the mobile menu toggle functionality with proper event handling, smooth transitions, and user-friendly interactions. Fix any syntax errors in the showSlide function and ensure all functions are properly implemented.
